sql.if: AND (EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM `building` b JOIN `building_attribute` district_attr ON (b.`object_id` = district_attr.`object_id` AND district_attr.`status` = 1 AND district_attr.`attribute_type_id` = 500 AND district_attr.`value_id` = #{additionalParams.district}) JOIN `building_address` addr ON (b.`parent_id` = addr.`object_id` AND addr.`parent_entity_id` = 300) WHERE b.`status` IN (1, 0) AND addr.`parent_id` = e.`object_id` ) OR EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM `building` b JOIN `building_address` addr ON (addr.`status` IN (1, 0) AND addr.`parent_entity_id` = 300) JOIN `building_attribute` district_attr ON (b.`object_id` = district_attr.`object_id` AND district_attr.`status` = 1 AND district_attr.`attribute_type_id` = 500 AND district_attr.`value_id` = #{additionalParams.district}) JOIN `building_attribute` ref_attr ON (b.`object_id` = ref_attr.`object_id` AND ref_attr.`status` = 1 AND ref_attr.`attribute_type_id` = 501 AND ref_attr.`value_id` = addr.`object_id`) WHERE b.`status` IN (1, 0) AND addr.`parent_id` = e.`object_id` ) )

mapper.select: select distinct s.`object_id` from `street` s join `street_attribute` street_attr_name on (street_attr_name.`status` = 1 and s.`object_id` = street_attr_name.`object_id` and street_attr_name.`attribute_type_id` = 300) join `street_string_value` street_name on (street_name.`id` = street_attr_name.`value_id`) where s.`status` = 1 and s.`parent_entity_id` = 400 and s.`parent_id` = #{cityId} and street_name.`value` = #{street} and exists( select 1 from `building_address` addr join `building` b on (b.`status` = 1 and ((b.`parent_id` = addr.`object_id` and b.`parent_entity_id` = 1500) or exists(select 1 from `building_attribute` ba where ba.`object_id` = b.`object_id` and ba.`status` = 1 and ba.`attribute_type_id` = 501 and ba.`value_id` = addr.`object_id`))) join `building_attribute` dstr on (dstr.`status` = 1 and dstr.`object_id` = b.`object_id`) join `organization_attribute` oa on (oa.`status` = 1 and oa.`object_id` = #{organizationId} and oa.`attribute_type_id` = 902) where addr.`status` = 1 and addr.`parent_id` = s.`object_id` and addr.`parent_entity_id` = 300 and dstr.`value_id` = oa.`value_id` )
